RememberOpenedFiles = true
RememberStatePerDocument = true

ReloadModifiedDocuments = true
FullPathInTitle = false
ShowMenubar = true

ShowToc = false
ShowFavorites = false

DefaultZoom = fit page
WindowState = 1
WindowPos = 0 0 0 0
ShowStartPage = true
